author: Michael Balsamo and Michael R. Sisak
title: Federal Bureau of Prisons to lock all inmates in cells for weeks...
description: The federal Bureau of Prisons is locking all its 146,000 inmates in their cells for the next two weeks in an unparalleled effort to slow the spread of the coronavirus, as the focus shifts to a Louisiana compound, where two inmates have died and nearly 20 othe…
